edu.unl.abbot.vicar

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Global

  • public class Global
extends java.lang.Object
    Installation specific settings.
    Version:
    0.8, 12/15/2012
    Author:
    Frank Smutniak, Center for Digital Research in the Humanities, http://cdrh.unl.edu

    • Field Detail

      • BASE_USER_DIR

        public static java.lang.String BASE_USER_DIR
        The base directory where vicar will store all of its files. New installations should verify it is writeable by Vicar.

      • SCHEMA_DIR

        public static java.lang.String SCHEMA_DIR
        The directory where system provided Abbot schema files reside.

      • SCHEMA_DESC

        public static java.lang.String SCHEMA_DESC
        The file which contains descriptions of Abbot schema files.

      • SED_PATH

        public static java.lang.String SED_PATH
        The path to the sed unix command used by Server.Convert.ProcMngr for modifying information in abbot generated files.

      • URL_BASE

        public static java.lang.String URL_BASE
        The base URL at which vicar will be located. It is used by Signin.java, OpenSignin.java and Password.java to redirect after an OpenID signin or send password/registration information to the user. If you are running it on your own computer that should likely be http://127.0.0.1:8888 for a jetty install and http://127.0.0.1:8080 for a tomcat install.

      • LOGFILE_PATH

        public static java.lang.String LOGFILE_PATH
        The file into which log information is written by LogWriter.

      • ACCTFILE_PATH

        public static java.lang.String ACCTFILE_PATH
        The file containing usernames and encrypted passwords written by Signin.

      • SESSION_FILE

        public static java.lang.String SESSION_FILE
        The file containing a particular user's saved settings. Used by AbbotConvert to store the most recently used schema file name and the vector of errors found during validation. This file is read by Vicar following sign in.

      • TITLE

        public static java.lang.String TITLE
        The title displayed on the Signin.html main page.

      • URL_SIGNIN

        public static java.lang.String URL_SIGNIN
        The URL to which Signout.html redirects.

      • URL_APPL

        public static java.lang.String URL_APPL
        The URL of the application directed to by Signin or OpenSignin upon sign in success.

      • URL_LOGIN_SFX

        public static java.lang.String URL_LOGIN_SFX
        The URL suffix needed by OpenSignin.java for a redirect. This is brittle as the first part is also found in sitemap.xmap and needs to be made less brittle.

      • GMAIL_ID

        public static java.lang.String GMAIL_ID
        The gmail.com user id by which email messages from Vicar will be sent to users.

      • GMAIL_PWD

        public static java.lang.String GMAIL_PWD
        The gmail.com password for GMAIL_ID by which email messages from Vicar will be send to users. This value should be hidden before posting to github or any public location!

      • Global

        public Global()
